parameter.name: expectedErrorMessage
parameter.value:
Email is Required
Security Answer is Required

parameter.name: expectedErrorMessage
parameter.value:
Email is invalid
If you have forgotten your security answer, please contact Plan Technical Support, Website Support option, at (877)-694-4015 so we can assist you with resetting your security question. Please note: The Security Answer is case sensitive.

parameter.name: expectedErrorMessage
parameter.value: The security questions selected should not be same.

parameter.name: expectedErrorMessage
parameter.value:
Registered Username is Required
The Registered Username format is invalid. A Registered Username can contain both numbers and letters, as well as the special characters @ . - _. The Registered Username must be at least 7 characters in length, up to a maximum of 64.

parameter.name: expectedErrorMessage
parameter.value: The Registered Username format is invalid. A Registered Username can contain both numbers and letters, as well as the special characters @ . - _. The Registered Username must be at least 7 characters in length, up to a maximum of 64.

parameter.value: By deleting this record you will only be removing them from this contribution and not the record keeping system. Are you sure you want to delete the following record?

parameter.Query: update users set default_ga_id=null where logon_id = ?

select distinct uda.ga_id from user_data_access uda join(select ga_id from access_customization_view where access_type_code='PSC_WEB' and accu_code='PlanEmpower') reftable ON uda.ga_id = reftable.ga_id where uda.user_logon_id = ?
delete from user_security_questions where user_logon_id =?
update ISIS_PASSWORD set effdate =effdate-360 where user_logon_id = ?
select email_address from users where logon_id = ?
delete from FRIENDLY_USERNAME where user_logon_id =? and FRIENDLY_USERNAME in ( select FRIENDLY_USERNAME from users where logon_id = ?)

update users set LAST_LOGIN_DATE_TIME = null , cas_web_agreement_accept_ind=null, CAS_WEB_AGREEMENT_DPDATE_TIME = null , DEFAULT_GA_ID = null , FRIENDLY_USERNAME = null , FRIENDLY_USERNAME_OPT_OUT_IND = null where logon_id =?
select ga_id from user_data_access where dpdate_time = (select max(dpdate_time) from user_data_access where user_logon_id= ? ) and ga_id is not null
insert into std_restrc values (std_restrcq.nextval, ?, 'GA', 'Y', 'Y', null, null, null,?, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, 0, null)

select distinct ref1.ga_id from (select distinct ga_id from user_data_access userdatatable join (select distinct ga.id, 'no division' from group_account ga where termdate is null minus select distinct ga.id, 'no division' from group_account ga, gc_subset gs where ga.gc_id = GS.GC_ID and ga.termdate is null union select distinct ga.id, 'has divisions' from group_account ga, gc_subset gs where ga.gc_id = GS.GC_ID and ga.termdate is null order by id) reftable ON userdatatable.ga_id = reftable.id where userdatatable.user_logon_id = ?) ref1 join (select ga_id from access_customization_view where access_type_code='PSC_WEB' and accu_code='PlanEmpower') ref2 ON ref1.ga_id = ref2.ga_id

select distinct ref1.ga_id from (select distinct ga_id from user_data_access userdatatable join (SELECT GA.ID, count(GS.BASIS) as count FROM GC_SUBSET GS, GROUP_CLIENT GC, GROUP_ACCOUNT GA WHERE GA. GC_ID = GC.ID AND GC .ID = GS .GC_ID AND GS .BASIS IS NOT NULL AND GS .VALUE IS NOT NULL group by GA.ID order by GA.ID asc) reftable ON userdatatable.ga_id = reftable.id where userdatatable.user_logon_id = ? and reftable.count > '1') ref1 join (select ga_id from access_customization_view where access_type_code='PSC_WEB' and accu_code='PlanEmpower') ref2 ON ref1.ga_id = ref2.ga_id

select distinct ref1.ga_id from (select distinct ga_id from user_data_access userdatatable join (SELECT GA.ID, count(GS.BASIS) as count FROM GC_SUBSET GS, GROUP_CLIENT GC, GROUP_ACCOUNT GA WHERE GA. GC_ID = GC.ID AND GC .ID = GS .GC_ID AND GS .BASIS IS NOT NULL AND GS .VALUE IS NOT NULL group by GA.ID order by GA.ID asc) reftable ON userdatatable.ga_id = reftable.id where userdatatable.user_logon_id = ? and reftable.count = '1') ref1 join (select ga_id from access_customization_view where access_type_code='PSC_WEB' and accu_code='PlanEmpower') ref2 ON ref1.ga_id = ref2.ga_id
select default_ga_id from users where logon_id = ?

SELECT A.ID, A.SSN , A.SSN_EXT , A.LAST_NAME , B.GA_ID , B.STATUS_CODE , B.STATUS_SUBCODE FROM INDIVIDUAL A, PART_AGRMT B WHERE A.ID = B. IND_ID AND B. GA_ID = ? AND A. SSN_EXT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.LAST_NAME

select distinct ref1.ga_id from (select distinct userdatatable.ga_id from user_data_access userdatatable join (select ga_id from part_agrmt where status_subcode = 'ERR') reftable ON userdatatable.ga_id = reftable.ga_id where userdatatable.user_logon_id = ?) ref1 join (select ga_id from access_customization_view where access_type_code='PSC_WEB' and accu_code='PlanEmpower') ref2 ON ref1.ga_id = ref2.ga_id
select b.ssn,b.id from part_agrmt a, individual b where a.ga_id = ? and status_subcode='ERR'and a.ind_id=b.id

select distinct ref1.ga_id from (select distinct userdatatable.ga_id from user_data_access userdatatable join (select p.ga_id from employment e,part_agrmt p where p.ind_id= e.ind_id and e.emp_termdate is not null and emp_termdate <= trunc(sysdate) order by emp_termdate desc) reftable ON userdatatable.ga_id = reftable.ga_id where userdatatable.user_logon_id =?) ref1 join (select ga_id from access_customization_view where access_type_code='PSC_WEB' and accu_code='PlanEmpower') ref2 ON ref1.ga_id = ref2.ga_id
select e.ind_id from employment e,part_agrmt p where p.ind_id= e.ind_id and e.emp_termdate is not null and emp_termdate <= trunc(sysdate) and p.ga_id= ? order by emp_termdate desc

select distinct ref1.ga_id from (select distinct userdatatable.ga_id from user_data_access userdatatable join (select ga.id, pv.SSN_MASKING_ALLOWED_IND as ssnMaskingAllowedInd, pv.SSN_MASKING_FORMAT_VIEW_MODE as ssnMaskingFormatViewMode, pv.SSN_MASKING_FORMAT_INPUT_MODE as ssnMaskingFormatInputMode, prov_company from PROV_COMPANY pv, product p, group_account ga where pv.code = p.PROV_COMPANY and pv.SSN_MASKING_ALLOWED_IND = 'Y' and p.id = ga.prod_id) reftable ON userdatatable.ga_id = reftable.id where userdatatable.user_logon_id = ?) ref1 join (select ga_id from access_customization_view where access_type_code='PSC_WEB' and accu_code='PlanEmpower') ref2 ON ref1.ga_id = ref2.ga_id
update users set DEFAULT_GA_ID=? where logon_id=?

SELECT DISTINCT gm.GA_ID as GaId, gm.SDMT_CODE as SdmtCode, gm.SEQNBR as Seqnbr, gm.DESCR as Descr from std_mnty std, grp_def_mnty gm, avail_invopt ai where std.code = gm.sdmt_code AND gm.ga_id = ? AND ai.ga_id = gm.ga_id AND ai.sdmt_code = gm.sdmt_code AND ai.gdmt_seqnbr = gm.seqnbr AND ai.sddety_code = 'REG' AND ai.effdate <= sysdate AND (ai.termdate IS NULL OR ai.termdate > sysdate) AND ai.part_allocn_ind = 'Y' AND gm.SDMT_CODE IN (?) AND std.irs_rollover_source_code IS NULL ORDER BY gm.SDMT_CODE, gm.SEQNBR

SELECT DISTINCT gm.GA_ID as GaId, gm.SDMT_CODE as SdmtCode, gm.SEQNBR as Seqnbr, gm.DESCR as Descr from std_mnty std, grp_def_mnty gm, avail_invopt ai where std.code = gm.sdmt_code AND gm.ga_id = ? AND ai.ga_id = gm.ga_id AND ai.sdmt_code = gm.sdmt_code AND ai.gdmt_seqnbr = gm.seqnbr AND ai.sddety_code = 'REG' AND ai.effdate <= sysdate AND (ai.termdate IS NULL OR ai.termdate > sysdate) AND ai.part_allocn_ind = 'Y' AND std.irs_rollover_source_code IS NULL ORDER BY gm.SDMT_CODE, gm.SEQNBR
select b.ssn,b.id from part_agrmt a, individual b where a.ga_id = ? and status_code='T'and a.ind_id=b.id
update users set user_category = 'PLAN EMPLOYEE' where logon_id=?
select default_ga_id from users where logon_id=?
select ssn from individual where ssn = ?
select distinct gcs_basis,gcs_value from user_data_access where ga_id=?
delete FROM isis_password WHERE user_logon_id = ? and EFFDATE not IN(select max(EFFDATE) from isis_password where user_logon_id=?)
delete FROM isis_password WHERE user_logon_id = ? and EFFDATE not IN(select min(EFFDATE) from isis_password where user_logon_id=?)
select * from isis_password where user_logon_id = ?
update ISIS_PASSWORD set effdate =sysdate where user_logon_id = ?
select distinct av.accu_code,ud.prod_id, ud.prov_company from user_data_access ud join access_customization_view av on ud.ga_id = av.ga_id where user_logon_id = ? and av.access_type_code='PSC_WEB'
select distinct GA_ID from access_customization_view where GA_ID in (select DISTINCT GA_ID from user_data_access where user_logon_id=? and GA_ID is not null) and accu_code='PlanEmpower'
update group_account set ssn_masking_allowed_ind ='Y',ssn_masking_format_view_mode = 'XXX-XX-####', ssn_masking_format_input_mode = 'XXX-XX-####' where id=?
update isis_password set invalid_login_count=2 where user_logon_id=?
update isis_password set invalid_login_count=0 where user_logon_id=?
Update users set termdate = ? where logon_id=?
Update users set termdate = '06-FEB-22' where logon_id=?

select user_logon_id, TO_CHAR(DPDATE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD hh24:mi') DPDATE, substr(exception, instr(exception, 'IP_ADDR>')+8, (instr(exception, '</IP_ADDR>') - (instr(exception, 'IP_ADDR>')+8))) IP , substr(exception, instr(exception, 'BROWSER>')+8, (instr(exception, '</BROWSER>') - (instr(exception, 'BROWSER>')+8))) browser , substr(exception, instr(exception, 'FULL_VERSION>')+13, (instr(exception, '</FULL_VERSION>') - (instr(exception, 'FULL_VERSION>')+13))) major, substr(exception, instr(exception, 'MINOR_VERSION>')+14, (instr(exception, '</MINOR_VERSION>') - (instr(exception, 'MINOR_VERSION>')+14))) minor from menu_activity where application = ? and menu_feature_code = ? and user_logon_id=? order by DPDATE desc
